fields.name: AllowedExternalRedirectUrls
fields.description:
External URLs that can be redirected to as part of logging in or logging out of the app. Note that the query string part of the URL is ignored.
This is an advanced setting typically only needed by Windows Store application backends.
Note that URLs within the current domain are always implicitly allowed.

fields.name: CookieExpiration
fields.description: The configuration settings of the session cookie's expiration.

fields.name: Nonce
fields.description: The configuration settings of the nonce used in the login flow.

fields.name: PreserveUrlFragmentsForLogins
fields.description: true if the fragments from the request are preserved after the login request is made; otherwise, false.

fields.name: Routes
fields.description: The routes that specify the endpoints used for login and logout requests.
